10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abdullah bin Abi Qatadah that his father said:"The messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'When the call to prayer is given, do not stand up until you see me

chapter.ara-name: باب قِيَامِ النَّاسِ إِذَا رَأَوُا الإِمَامَ
chapter.eng-name: People standing when they see the Imam
